text: Víctor Javier Rivero Faccioli (born 15 March 1980) is a Chilean football manager who currently coaches to Primera B de Chile side San Luis de Quillota. ==Honors== ===Club=== ====As Manager==== ;San Luis de Quillota * Primera B de Chile (1): 2014–15 ;Unión La Calera * Primera B de Chile (1): 2017 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean football managers Category:Primera B de Chile players Category:Primera B de Chile managers Category:San Luis de Quillota footballers Category:Unión La Calera footballers Category:San Luis de Quillota managers Category:Rangers de Talca managers Category:Everton de Viña del Mar managers Category:Unión La Calera managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Víctor Rivero
